channel.title: What is Hugo Catalog? on Hugo Catalog
channel.description: Recent content in What is Hugo Catalog? on Hugo Catalog

item.title: Installation
item.description: Prerequisites Hugo Installing Hugo Catalog is very easy, simply run the following command inside your themes folder: git clone git@github.com:benmarte/hugo-catalog.git && rm -rf ./hugo-catalog/.git How to customize and configure Hugo Catalog In order to customize your Hugo Catalog instance you need to copy the following code to your sites config.toml file: [Params] # the path to your site logo logo = '/images/hugo-catalog-icon.svg' # enables displaying the site name in the header disable_site_name_header = false # sets the sites primary color primary_color = "#003b5c" # sets the sites secondary color secondary_color = "#C6007E" # sets the sites font family font_family = "Montserrat" # enables subnav page links in nav enable_subnav = true logo Variable Type: string

item.title: Shortcodes
item.description: Audio Shortcode The Audio shortcode can be used to document the audible aspects, for example background music, sound effects or jingles in the browser-provided interface. Shortcode Parameters src: required string - the url pointing to the source file title: optional string - a title for the audio clip, otherwise the filename is used autoplay: optional boolean - if true, the audio clip plays without interaction loop: optional boolean - if true, the audio clip plays repeatedly span: required number - [1â€“6] width of the specimen Example

item.title: Logos
item.description: Overview Feel free to download the individual Hugo Catalog logos or download the zip file which contains all logos. Hugo Catalog Logo Horizontal Hugo Catalog Logo Vertical Hugo Catalog Icon Hugo Catalog Logos 6.32 KB
